[[Persepolis F.C.|Persepolis]] faced [[Gostaresh Foolad F.C.|Gostaresh Foolad]] in this final game. The first leg took place on May 13, 2010 at 16:00 [[Iran Standard Time|IRDT]] ([[UTC+4:30]]) at [[Yadegar-e Emam Stadium]] in [[Tabriz]] and the second leg took place on May 24, 2010 at 16:00 [[Iran Standard Time|local time]] ([[UTC+3:30]]) at [[Azadi Stadium]], [[Tehran]]. ==Format== The rules for the final were exactly the same as the one for the previous knockout rounds. The tie was contested over two legs with [[Away goals rule|away goals]] deciding the winner if the two teams were level on goals after the second leg. If the teams could still not be separated at that stage, then [[extra time]] would have been played with a [[Penalty shootout (association football)|penalty shootout]] (taking place if the teams were
